creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: constructed like an apron; larger unlined part has center embroidered section of geometric filled rectangles, border of plain and embroidered strips on three sides; two corners have squares with embroidery inset with cross pattern; small lined part has hexagons in squares; red, black, tan, khaki, blue; corner ties cut on both parts
title: Baby Carrier
